conditions: Cervical Cancer, Breast Cancer, Lung Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Endometrial Cancer, Ovarian Cancer, Hypertension, Diabetes, Reproductive Disorder
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Incidence and mortality rate of cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women aged 35-64 years old
* Women with registered permanent residence in Guangzhou
* Women with informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women without informed consent
* Women with reading and/or writing difficulties
* Women with serious mental disorders
